channel.title: Fightpits blinking board?
channel.description: does anybody know a fix to the 317 pi fightpits blinking board thing?

item.title: Fightpits blinking board?
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

That’s probably because the process() void is calling for that interface to be put up there every time it is a new server tick = ~600ms. What you need to do is show that interface outside of the process loop, but make the text update with the process loop.

Read full topic

item.title: Fightpits blinking board?
item.dc:creator: @scenemo scenemo
item.description:
@scenemo wrote:

Why does everyone always assume that nobody uses the search button or google -_- and why does everyone assume that anyone never trys there own and just wants to be spoonfed. obviously i came here because i used the ‘search’ button ‘google’ and tried on my own. Of course nobody helps because thier not getting anything out of it and/or they really dont know the answer to the question so they change the subject to make them sound more superior than the other.
anywayz… for fight pits theres a message board on the right that counts down the seconds till the next game. and tells how many people there is left to kill. it blinks every time a second on the timer goes down

Read full topic
